CreateManagedAccount.name: CreateManagedAccount
CreateManagedAccount.description: Grants permission to create an account managed by AWS Control Tower.

DeregisterManagedAccount.name: DeregisterManagedAccount
DeregisterManagedAccount.description:
Grants permission to deregister an account created through the account factory from
                                                AWS Control Tower.

DeregisterOrganizationalUnit.name: DeregisterOrganizationalUnit
DeregisterOrganizationalUnit.description: Grants permission to deregister an organizational unit from AWS Control Tower management.

DescribeAccountFactoryConfig.name: DescribeAccountFactoryConfig
DescribeAccountFactoryConfig.description: Grants permission to describe the current account factory configuration.

DescribeCoreService.name: DescribeCoreService
DescribeCoreService.description: Grants permission to describe resources managed by core accounts in AWS Control Tower.

DescribeGuardrail.name: DescribeGuardrail
DescribeGuardrail.description: Grants permission to describe a guardrail.

DescribeGuardrailForTarget.name: DescribeGuardrailForTarget
DescribeGuardrailForTarget.description: Grants permission to describe a guardrail for a organizational unit.

DescribeManagedAccount.name: DescribeManagedAccount
DescribeManagedAccount.description: Grants permission to describe an account created through account factory.

DescribeManagedOrganizationalUnit.name: DescribeManagedOrganizationalUnit
DescribeManagedOrganizationalUnit.description:
Grants permission to describe an AWS Organizations organizational unit managed by
                                                AWS Control Tower.

DescribeSingleSignOn.name: DescribeSingleSignOn
DescribeSingleSignOn.description: Grants permission to describe the current AWS Control Tower SSO configuration.

DisableGuardrail.name: DisableGuardrail
DisableGuardrail.description: Grants permission to disable a guardrail from an organizational unit.

EnableGuardrail.name: EnableGuardrail
EnableGuardrail.description: Grants permission to enable a guardrail to an organizational unit.

GetAvailableUpdates.name: GetAvailableUpdates
GetAvailableUpdates.description: Grants permission to list available updates for the current AWS Control Tower deployment.

GetGuardrailComplianceStatus.name: GetGuardrailComplianceStatus
GetGuardrailComplianceStatus.description: Grants permission to get the current compliance status of a guardrail.

GetHomeRegion.name: GetHomeRegion
GetHomeRegion.description: Grants permission to get the home region of the AWS Control Tower setup.

GetLandingZoneStatus.name: GetLandingZoneStatus
GetLandingZoneStatus.description: Grants permission to get the current status of the landing zone setup.

ListDirectoryGroups.name: ListDirectoryGroups
ListDirectoryGroups.description: Grants permission to list the current directory groups available through SSO.

ListEnabledGuardrails.name: ListEnabledGuardrails
ListEnabledGuardrails.description: Grants permission to list currently enabled guardrails.

ListGuardrailViolations.name: ListGuardrailViolations
ListGuardrailViolations.description: Grants permission to list existing guardrail violations.

ListGuardrails.name: ListGuardrails
ListGuardrails.description: Grants permission to list all available guardrails.

ListGuardrailsForTarget.name: ListGuardrailsForTarget
ListGuardrailsForTarget.description:
Grants permission to list guardrails and their current state for a organizational
                                                unit.

ListManagedAccounts.name: ListManagedAccounts
ListManagedAccounts.description: Grants permission to list accounts managed through AWS Control Tower.

ListManagedAccountsForGuardrail.name: ListManagedAccountsForGuardrail
ListManagedAccountsForGuardrail.description: Grants permission to list managed accounts with a specified guardrail applied.

ListManagedAccountsForParent.name: ListManagedAccountsForParent
ListManagedAccountsForParent.description: Grants permission to list managed accounts under an organizational unit.

ListManagedOrganizationalUnits.name: ListManagedOrganizationalUnits
ListManagedOrganizationalUnits.description: Grants permission to list organizational units managed by AWS Control Tower.

ListManagedOrganizationalUnitsForGuardra.name: ListManagedOrganizationalUnitsForGuardrail
ListManagedOrganizationalUnitsForGuardra.description:
Grants permission to list managed organizational units that have a specified guardrail
                                                applied.

ManageOrganizationalUnit.name: ManageOrganizationalUnit
ManageOrganizationalUnit.description: Grants permission to set up an organizational unit to be managed by AWS Control Tower.

SetupLandingZone.name: SetupLandingZone
SetupLandingZone.description: Grants permission to set up or update AWS Control Tower landing zone.

UpdateAccountFactoryConfig.name: UpdateAccountFactoryConfig
UpdateAccountFactoryConfig.description: Grants permission to update the account factory configuration.
